comment: Great price. Good if you want a budget smokey whisky.
Peaty and good start, but a little disappointed with the ending. After Laphroaig wanted to try another Islay Whisky, but ended up just wishing it was Laphroaig.

Rökig med liten eftersmak.
Doften liknar laphroig.
Rund och snäll efter en stund i munnen.
Nice Islay whiskey.  Smooth.   Definitely going to keep this around.  Great Islay taste at a hell of a price.  Check it.  Won’t change your life, but a very good whiskey and good value.
Paid for it $30 in the nearest grocery store. Can't ask much from an Islay at this price point, but it's not that bad. Not bad at all.

Checks all of the boxes I look for in an Islay at a fraction of the price. Lots of great peaty, smoky flavor with a smooth finish. Like another review said, nothing exceptional but for the price I’d have a hard time finding a competitor.
